job_description: 2023 PhD Residency - Machine Learning for Medical Imaging - job post Loon Mountain View, CA $114,000 - $134,000 a year -  Internship You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to apply Apply on company site save-icon Job details Salary $114,000 - $134,000 a year Job Type Internship X is Alphabet’s moonshot factory. We are a diverse group of inventors and entrepreneurs who build and launch technologies that aim to improve the lives of millions, even billions, of people. Our goal: 10x impact on the world’s most intractable problems, not just 10% improvement. We approach projects that have the aspiration and riskiness of research with the speed and ambition of a startup. THE FOUNDATION OF AN AMAZING JOURNEY Our goal at X is to make the world a radically better place. In order to do that we seek fresh unexpected perspectives, from different fields, and that’s why we’re excited about you. Life here isn’t easy, but it’s fun. We’re trying to build things most people can’t even imagine, and we’re doing it with the hope of making a huge, positive impact on the world. You’ll be embedded into a moonshot project, where you’ll partner with team members to solve key challenges. This isn’t your ordinary internship. You’ll be positively challenged and pushed professionally, in ways that you may have never experienced. If this excites you - keep reading. DURING YOUR INTERNSHIP YOU CAN EXPECT: To be placed on one of our confidential or public X projects To get paid competitively and with Google benefits To be part of a lively community of other Interns and Residents To attend colloquium and discussions with team leads from across Google, DeepMind and external organizations What You’ll be Working on Implementing new machine learning algorithms for medical imaging Prototyping machine learning pipeline solutions Work closely with team members in the sensing and simulation space Understanding the challenges and brainstorming solutions to those challenges Engaging with the intern community during the program, engaging with the X community, attending colloquia and tech talks Minimum Qualifications Currently enrolled in a PhD program in a STEM field such as CS, Engineering, or Mathematics/Statistics with a strong background and interest in machine learning and computer vision. Familiar with modern machine learning algorithms (Transformers, NeRFs, etc), especially computer vision models. Experience with coding those models in TensorFlow is preferred. Experience with large data processing & training. Experience with handling dirty and noisy data. Strong coding skills, experience with one or more general purpose programming languages such as Python, C++, etc. Strong interest in rapid prototyping and physical experimentation Preferred Qualifications Experience with medical imaging, especially ultrasound Experience with sensor fusion combining multiple data sources from stereo camera, depth sensor, LiDAR, etc. The US base salary range for this position is $114,000 - $134,000 + benefits. Our salary ranges are determined by role, level, and location. Within the range, individual pay is determined by work location and additional factors, including job-related skills, experience, and relevant education or training. Your recruiter can share more about the specific salary range for your location during the hiring process. Please note that the compensation details listed in US role postings reflect the base salary only, and do not include benefits. At X, we don't just accept difference - we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please contact us at: x-accommodation-request@x.team.

PhD Residency - AI/ML - LLMs, NLP, Abstraction, Reasoning - job post Loon Mountain View, CA $103,000 - $127,000 a year -  Internship You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to apply Apply on company site save-icon Job details Salary $103,000 - $127,000 a year Job Type Internship X is Alphabet’s moonshot factory. We are a diverse group of inventors and entrepreneurs who build and launch technologies that aim to improve the lives of millions, even billions, of people. Our goal: 10x impact on the world’s most intractable problems, not just 10% improvement. We approach projects that have the aspiration and riskiness of research with the speed and ambition of a startup. THE FOUNDATION OF AN AMAZING JOURNEY Our goal at X is to make the world a radically better place. In order to do that we seek fresh unexpected perspectives, from different fields, and that’s why we’re excited about you. Life here isn’t easy, but it’s fun. We’re trying to build things most people can’t even imagine, and we’re doing it with the hope of making a huge, positive impact on the world. You’ll be embedded into a moonshot project, where you’ll partner with team members to solve key challenges. This isn’t your ordinary internship. You’ll be positively challenged and pushed professionally, in ways that you may have never experienced. If this excites you - keep reading. DURING YOUR INTERNSHIP YOU CAN EXPECT: To be placed on one of our confidential or public X projects To get paid competitively and with Google benefits To be part of a lively community of other Interns and Residents To addend colloquium and discussions with team leads from across Google, DeepMind and external organizations DURATION: Duration: a flexible 4 months to 1 year program based on project team needs and your availability ABOUT THE TEAM: One of X’s confidential projects is looking for new team members interested in building the future of ML with common sense reasoning and context. The team at X is experimenting with new ways to build and innovate ML frameworks and interacting abstractions using state of the art approaches. If you are interested in making the world a radically better place by improving software productivity and unleashing more engineering creativity, we want to talk to you! WHAT YOU'LL BE WORKING ON: Collaborating with the X project team to apply novel approaches (RL, transformers, VAE, other state of the art methods in ML) to build an MVP Rapidly develop prototypes to evaluate feasibility of various approaches; dispassionately assess performance and help team scope next steps Apply, modify, and develop new algorithms and software tools as the project demands Organize and process large volumes of data Work cross-functionally with experts at X, from Alphabet, and academia Report out to team on findings Engaging with the Internship community during the program (learning Moonshot thinking, attending colloquium and tech talks) & having fun! MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS: Currently enrolled in a PhD program in Computer Science with a strong interest in LLMs, NLP, reinforcement learning, symbolic systems, and abstraction and reasoning A fast learner with strong coding skills in Python or equivalent Passionate about development and the future of software engineering Ability to work in a small team / rapid prototyping environment and deal with uncertainty and fluidity PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS: Open-source projects that demonstrate relevant skills and/or publications in relevant conferences and journals (OOPSLA, PLDI, POPL, ICSE/FSE, and/or NeurIPS, ICLR or ICML) Aptitude in TensorFlow Familiarity with programming language theory/practices and/or static code analysis Experience working in a startup/research environment The US base salary range for this position is $103,000 - $127,000 + benefits. Our salary ranges are determined by role, level, and location. Within the range, individual pay is determined by work location and additional factors, including job-related skills, experience, and relevant education or training. Please note that the compensation details listed in US role postings reflect the base salary only, and do not include benefits. 2023 PhD Residency - Artificial Intelligence - job post Loon Mountain View, CA $103,000 - $127,000 a year -  Internship You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to apply Apply on company site save-icon Job details Salary $103,000 - $127,000 a year Job Type Internship X is Alphabet’s moonshot factory. MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS: Must be enrolled in a PhD program focused in a STEM field such as Computer Science, Physics, Chemistry, Neuroscience or Mathematics/Statistics. Strong interest and familiarity with machine learning. Completed coursework in calculus, linear algebra, and probability, or their equivalent. PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS: Experience working with TensorFlow Open-source projects that demonstrate relevant skills and/or publications in relevant conferences and journals (e.g. NIPS, ICML, ICLR, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, ICASSP) The US base salary range for this role is between $103,000 - $127,000 + benefits. As part of this early-stage work, the team is experimenting with quantitative and qualitative modeling techniques. Experience in developing system dynamics stock-and-flow models is a plus. WHAT YOU'LL BE WORKING ON: Apply the latest in data science techniques to build and deploy data pipelines and exploratory data analysis on large-scale datasets Test and develop new techniques to pull forward critical insights and communicate them clearly to a diverse group of stakeholders Collaborate with specialists in system dynamics and machine learning to build models of complex systems containing both quantitative and qualitative values and develop techniques to quickly identify feasible interventions on those systems Develop MVPs to test the team’s underlying hypotheses and dispassionately assess their performance against X’s moonshot criteria Identify and work with external partners to explore new, more accessible approaches to data analysis and interpretation Work cross-functionally across, X, Alphabet and academia with relevant experts Attend X talks and symposia, and learn as much as you can about the moonshot factory’s unique approach MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS: Currently enrolled in a PhD program in a STEM field or any domain with a strong data science component, e.g., computer science, mathematics, biology, neuroscience, etc. Experience developing and working with complex systems models Passionate about the impact of new technologies on historically oppressed peoples Ability to work in a small team / rapid prototyping environment and deal with uncertainty and fluidity PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS: Hands-on experience with system dynamics Experience with data analytics, machine learning and deep neural networks Fluency in Python The US base salary range for this role is between $108,000 - $127,000 + benefits.
